hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Top

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Wallet# and #Epona's Song#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Compass Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
